sections.heading: Purpose of the Task History screen
body: Task History is used to review and manage tasks that have been completed (closed).
It helps you understand what actions were performed, when they were done, and which plants were affected.
The screen may open with a predefined filter applied (for example, showing history for a specific plant), or it may display all completed tasks.

sections.heading: Completed task tiles
body: Each tile represents a single completed task, including the task type (e.g., Watering, Misting, Fertilising), plant name, location, and completion date.
Completed tasks may include an optional note added when the task was closed.
Notes are displayed only when the tile is expanded.

sections.heading: Viewing notes: expand and collapse
body: To view a note for a completed task, you can expand the tile by tapping the tile itself.
You can also use the three-dots menu to Expand or Collapse notes for a task (depending on the current state).
This lets you keep the list compact while still having access to detailed history when needed.

sections.heading: Task tile menu (three-dots)
body: Each completed task tile provides a context menu with actions related to that specific history entry.
Expand/Collapse: shows or hides the note section inside the tile.
Edit reminder: navigates to the Reminder associated with the task so you can adjust recurrence or settings.
Go to plant: navigates to Plant Details for the plant linked to the task.
Delete task: permanently deletes the selected completed task from your account.

sections.heading: Floating Action Button (FAB) actions
body: The Task History screen includes a Floating Action Button (FAB) with actions for working with the history list.
Sort: changes the ordering of completed tasks.
Filter: narrows down the history list by selected criteria.
Delete: supports bulk deletion based on criteria (for example, tasks for a selected plant, tasks for a selected location, tasks of a specific type, or tasks older than a chosen threshold).

sections.heading: Sorting options
body: Sorting helps you review history in the order that best matches your workflow.
Available sorting options include: Completion date, Plant name, and Location.

sections.heading: Filtering options
body: Filters help you focus on a specific subset of completed tasks.
You can filter by Plant name, Location, Task type, and Completed date range.
Filters can be combined to narrow the list further, for example: Fertilising tasks completed in a selected location during a given month.

sections.heading: Bulk deletion (Delete action)
body: Bulk deletion allows you to permanently delete multiple completed tasks at once based on specified criteria.
Typical scenarios include clearing history for one plant, removing tasks for a location, deleting only one task type, or deleting tasks older than a selected date.
Bulk deletion is permanent and cannot be undone.

sections.heading: How Task History differs from Home
body: Home focuses on tasks that are due or overdue and helps you complete current work.
Task History focuses on tasks that are already completed and supports reviewing, sorting, filtering, and deleting historical entries.
Together, these screens cover both day-to-day execution (Home) and long-term tracking (Task History).
